product_title: Geyser 17-Ounce Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle
product_description: A vibrant hue elevates a double-walled stainless-steel water bottle that helps you stay hydrated in style.
product_details_and_care:
A vibrant hue elevates a double-walled stainless-steel water bottle that helps you stay hydrated in style. The bottle features signature ThermaS'well™ fabrication that keeps cold drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot drinks hot for up to 12, as well as a wide mouth that makes it easy to fill, add ice cubes and clean.
2 3/4" x 10 1/4"
Holds 17 oz.
Fits standard car cupholder
Nonleaching; toxin-free; virtually unbreakable
18/8 food-grade stainless steel
Hand wash
Imported
S'well donates a portion of the proceeds from the sale of each bottle to UNICEF to help provide clean drinking water to children around the world
Item #5975209
